timeline.headline: The Story of My Life
timeline.text:
Life? Don't talk to me about life!
Marvin (in "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy")

date.headline: School Years
date.text:
• Kindergarten
  • Primary school
  • Secondary school

Click on the leafs for more information.

date.headline: Primary School
date.text: St. Elisabeth was a catholic school. I was taught by nuns. So, I have very good manners.

date.headline: Secondary School
date.text: I visited the "Gymnasium" and attended courses in latin and french.

date.headline: My first computer experience
date.text: In this year my neighbor allowed me to use his Amiga 500 for work and gaming.

date.headline: My first own pc
date.text:
My first own pc had 16 MB RAM and a 20 GB HD.

The operating system wasn't linux by the way. ;)

date.headline: Matura
date.text: I finished the "Gymnasium" with a top grade.

date.headline: My first own car
date.text: 2000 was a very exciting year. I got my first own car. It was a Volkswagen.

date.headline: Military Service
date.text: I served as a signalman in the "Wiener Garde".

date.headline: St. Pölten University of Applied Sciences
date.text: I studied Computersimulations and communications engineering in St. Pölten.

date.headline: Erasmus - KTH Royal Institute of Technology
date.text: The fifth term of my studies, I spent in Stockholm at the KTH.

date.headline: Internship
date.text: The fifth term of my studies, I spent in Stockholm at the KTH.

date.headline: Graduation
date.text: I graduated with good success and had the honour to give a brief speech at my own graduation.

date.headline: First Job
date.text: At PDTS I worked on a prepaid credit card sales platform. I learned a lot about relational databases and worked mostly with PLSQL and Java.

date.headline: Switzerland
date.text: After working for two years in vienna I migrated to Switzerland.

date.headline: BDH Solutions
date.text: The fifth term of my studies, I spent in Stockholm at the KTH.

date.headline: Wedding
date.text: The fifth term of my studies, I spent in Stockholm at the KTH.

date.headline: Sympany
date.text: The fifth term of my studies, I spent in Stockholm at the KTH.
